fields.title: About
fields.content:
Application

Welcome to NZSL-signbank.

You can find the source code of NZSL-signbank in GitHub https://github.com/ODNZSL/NZSL-signbank.git

This site is based on an open-source application FinSL-signbank. The source code is publicly available and can be used and modified by anyone under the conditions of the license.

You can find the source code of FinSL-signbank in GitHub https://github.com/Signbank/FinSL-signbank

Other Signbank versions source codes are also available in GitHub: https://github.com/Signbank

Authors of the Signbank application:

NZSL-signbank is developed by Ackama

FinSL-signbank has been mainly developed by Henri Nieminen.
FinSL-signbank is a fork of NGT-signbank, which has been forked from Auslan-signbank.
FinSL-signbank is maintained by Henri Nieminen.

Original authors

  • Henri Nieminen <henri.nieminen@gmail.com>
  • Auslan-signbank
    • Steve Cassidy
    • Trevor Johnston
  • NGT-signbank
    • Wessel Stoop
    • Onno Crasborn
